content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Sela Ward

{| class="infobox" style="width: 22em; text-align: left; font-size: 90%; vertical-align: middle;"
|+ Sela Ward awards and nominations
|-
| colspan="2" style="text-align:center;"|  Ward in 2010
|- align="center"
! style="background:#cceecc; font-size:8pt;" width="60px"| Wins
! style="background:#eecccc; font-size:8pt;" width="60px"| Nominations
|- bgcolor=#eeeeff; align="center"
|
|
|}
